description.value:
Activate 1 Interact

Rovagug's mud smells and tastes like wet, sour earth. For 1 hour after you drink it, you have a +2 item bonus to saving throws against incapacitation effects. Also, you can use a single action to breathe out a @Template[type:cone|distance:20] of bitter vapor that causes an earth-shaking rumble that can be heard for 100 feet. Creatures and objects in the area take [[/r 8d6]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:38|basic:true]), decreasing Hardness by 10. An object's Hardness remains lowered for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}, and you can't use this breath again for the same amount of time.
